name: Picnic Match Blast
description:
Picnic Match Blast - A Same Game Matching Adventure
Join your friends on a fruity same game adventure in Picnic Match Blast! Summer just got hotter with challenging puzzles in this fun matching adventure game.

Match Apples, Bananas, Cherries, Oranges and more while you work your way through the sweet fruit filled levels.

HOW TO PLAY: Smash fruit by tapping on groups of 2 or more of the same pieces of fruit. Clear each level and avoid obstacles!

Are you stuck on a super sweet and sticky level? No problem, use in-game power ups to blast fruit away and work towards puzzle game victory!

Featured Powerups:
• Fruit blasting bomb that blasts away fruit and other silly game objects blocking your way!
• Fruit cross bomb will carve a vertical and horizontal path out of any fruit in it's way!
• Fruit color bomb will remove all of one type of fruit piece from the board!

Picnic Match Blast Fruit Game Features:
• A Fruity matching same game Adventure!
• Specially crafted power ups!
• Summer themed elements!
• Levels with varied challenges!
• No ads to interrupt your game play unless you choose to view ads for coins.
• In game tips and pop-ups to help you on tough levels!
• Free Download!

Send and Receive Help:
*Picnic Match Blast allows you to send and receive help from your friends every day to help you on your same game matching adventure.

Get this Free to Download Same Game App today and find out what summer picnic matching fun you've been missing!

* - You and your friend(s) must be connected with Facebook from within the game in order to send and receive help. An internet connection is required at all times during game play while connected with Facebook or your progress will not be saved.
